name: byteConvert
description: Target independent tools for several byte conversions.
releasenote:
Added bit() function to read/write single bits from a byte,
    				API Change: toBits() and fromBits() now use Array<Int> instead of Array<Bool>,
    				API Change: writeInt and writeUInt functions changed parameters to func(b, pos, num) to pattern used by other langs/APIs.
